arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Bayern Munich – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and Hoffenheim go head-to-head in the Bundesliga on Saturday at the PreZero Arena. Both sides will be looking to maintain their early-season momentum, with Bayern sitting atop the table and Hoffenheim seeking to build on their promising start under Christian Ilzer.
